channel.title: Homepage on YF Robotics Laboratory
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on YF Robotics Laboratory

item.title: Collaborate
item.description: We fund middle school and high school students from UK, US and China to travel across and co-work in local schools/universities on a collaborate robot project.

item.title: Contact us
item.description: Follow us on Twitter: @yfrobotics Address: YF Robotics Laboratory Birmingham, West Midland United Kingdom Email: yfrobotics@gmail.com

item.title: Development
item.description: We love opensource and we extensively work on industrial robots and make innovations using opensource software and hardware, that includes: gnu/gcc Linux ROS/Gazebo Arduino Raspberry Pi

item.title: Research
item.description: We work and publish papers in the research area of: Machine learning Reinforcement and transfer learning SLAM Operating systems and task scheduling for robots Dexterous robot hand Self-driving cars Safety for autonomous systems Swarm robots

item.title: STEM
item.description: We help and encourage makers and companies with their STEM products for robot / electronics / programming education. We also produce robot materials, tutorials and books for entry and mid-level robot learners.
